front.title: Implementing NIST infiltration correlations

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This tutorial is a guide on how to implement the NIST infiltration correlations (Ng et al., 2021) into EnergyPlus building energy simulation software for the US Department of Energy prototype commercial buildings. The implementation can also be generalized to other building energy simulation software and other building models.

seriesInfo.name: NIST technical note; NIST tech note; NIST TN
